alert.note: Alert for Macomb (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Macomb County through 745 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sterling Heights, or near Mount Clemens, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warren around 715 PM EDT. Clinton and Macomb Township around 720 PM EDT. Mount Clemens around 740 PM EDT. St. Clair Shores around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Clinton Township, Utica, Fraser, Roseville, Shelby Township and Eastpointe. People attending Freedom Hill Amphitheatre , and Jimmy Johns Field should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
